VoiceList.Entry: “Attention! Dismissed!!”
Cloud “Shinra soldiers… Even here…”
Aeris “What happened?”
Tifa “What?”
Red XIII “What happened?”
Yuffie “What is it?”
Cloud “Sh…!”
“Yaaay!!”
“Yaay Yaay!”
“Come on now,no running.”
Cait Sith “Hey! Look here! The Key Materia!”
“Well done.”
Cloud “Hey!”
Cait Sith “W, a second. I won't run or hide.”
“Yes,I was a spy. I was hired by the Shinra.”
Tifa “Don't mess with us!”
Aeris “…I trusted you. I can't believe you!”
“Ya dirty &*$*%$!”
Cloud “You think this's a big joke!?”
Cait Sith “I can't help it. What's done is done. That's just the way it is.”
“How 'bout if we go on like nothing ever happened?”
Cloud “You're pushin' it,Cait Sith! You gotta lot of nerve staying with us all the while being a spy!”
Cait Sith “Then,what are you goin' to do? Destroy me?”
Cait Sith “You'd just be wastin' your time if you tried. This body's just a toy anyway.”
“My real body's at Shinra Headquarters in Midgar. I'm controlin' this toy cat from there.”
Tifa “So you're from Shinra. Who are you?”
Aeris “So you're from Shinra. Who? Who are you! Tell me!”
Barret “Who the hell are ya!? What's your real name!?”
Yuffie “Part of the Shinra! Who the *&$# are you!?”
Cait Sith “Whoa,I can't tell you my name.”
Cloud “We're not gettin' anywhere.”
Cait Sith “Right? I told you! Talking won't do any good,so can't we just continue our journey?”
Cait Sith “…Alright,yes,I am a Shinra employee.” “But we're not completely enemies.”
Cait Sith “…Something bothers me. I think it's you're ways of living”
“You don't get paid You don't get praised. And yet you still risk your lives and continue on your journey. Seeing that makes me…”
Cait Sith “It just makes me think about my life. I don't think I'd feel too good if things ended the way it is now.”
Tifa “You're lying again.”
Aeris “…And so on,and so on…”
Barret “Hmph! You ain't foolin' us this time!”
Yuffie “Sounds fishy---”
Cloud “He won't come clean. And he won't quit being a spy.”
“We can't go on with someone like that. Pull your head out!”
Cait Sith “…I thought so. It won't do any good talking to you.”
“So,I've prepared myself in case something like this happened.”
Cait Sith “Why don't you listen to this.”
“Dad! Tifa!”
Tifa “Marlene!”
Aeris “Hey! That's Marlene!”
Barret “Ma…Marlene!?”
Cloud “…Marlene?”
“Hey! It's dad! Dad! It's me,Marlene!”
“Hey! It's Tifa! Tifa! You know what!”
“Hey! It's the flower lady! Flower lady…”
“Hey! It's Cloud!”
Cait Sith “…So,there's no other way but to listen to me.”
Cloud “You're the lowest…”
Cait Sith “I didn't want to do this either. Not by using dirty tricks and taking hostages…”
Cait Sith “So,this is how it is. There's no room for compromises. So why don't we go on as we did.”
Cait Sith “Tomorrow is the Temple of the Ancients,right? I know where it is so I'll tell you later.”
“Of course we'll get there after the Shinra, but you'll have to deal with that.”
Cloud “…Well,we're stuck… We'll have to do what he says.”
Tifa “…Marlene.”
Aeris “I wonder if Marlene is all right… I wonder what happened to Mom?”
Barret “Sorry,Cloud.”
Yuffie “Uh,yup.”
